publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-374 Mr Jamie Stone: Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly—That the Parliament agrees to establish a joint working committee with the Northern Ireland Assembly.
S1M-374 Mr Jamie Stone: Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly—That the Parliament agrees to establish a joint working committee with the Northern Ireland Assembly.
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Alex Neil*, Donald Gorrie*, Margaret Jamieson*

S1M-374 Mr Jamie Stone: Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly—That the Parliament agrees to establish a joint working committee with the Northern Ireland Assembly. Supported by: Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) David Mundell*

S1M-374 Mr Jamie Stone: Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly—That the Parliament agrees to establish a joint working committee with the Northern Ireland Assembly. Supported by: Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Margo MacDonald, David Mundell
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Robin Harper*
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Mr Murray Tosh*, Michael Russell*
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Mr David Davidson*

S1M-374 Mr Jamie Stone: Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly—That the Parliament agrees to establish a joint working committee with the Northern Ireland Assembly. Supported by: Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Margo MacDonald, David Mundell, Robin Harper, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Murray Tosh, Michael Russell, Mr David Davidson
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) David McLetchie*
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Mr Lloyd Quinan*
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Mr Jamie McGrigor*

S1M-374 Mr Jamie Stone: Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly—That the Parliament agrees to establish a joint working committee with the Northern Ireland Assembly. Supported by: Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Margo MacDonald, David Mundell, Robin Harper, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Murray Tosh, Michael Russell, Mr David Davidson, David McLetchie, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Jamie McGrigor
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Shona Robison*
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Christine Grahame*

S1M-374 Mr Jamie Stone: Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly—That the Parliament agrees to establish a joint working committee with the Northern Ireland Assembly. Supported by: Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Margo MacDonald, David Mundell, Robin Harper, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Murray Tosh, Michael Russell, Mr David Davidson, David McLetchie, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Nick Johnston*
S1M-374 Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly (lodged on 9 December 1999) Mr Duncan Hamilton*

S1M-374 Mr Jamie Stone: Joint Working with Northern Ireland Assembly—That the Parliament agrees to establish a joint working committee with the Northern Ireland Assembly. Supported by: Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie, Margaret Jamieson, Nora Radcliffe, Ms Margo MacDonald, David Mundell, Robin Harper, Mr Adam Ingram, Mr Gil Paterson, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Mr Murray Tosh, Michael Russell, Mr David Davidson, David McLetchie, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Shona Robison, Christine Grahame, Nick Johnston, Mr Duncan Hamilton
